text: Claude Guichard (11 November 1928 â€“ 30 August 2021) was a French politician and academic. He was born in Sainte-Foy-la-Grande, France. He was a member of the Independent Republicans. Guichard was a member of the National Assembly from 1967 until 1968 and from 1968 until 1973. Guichard died on 30 August 2021 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:French academics Category:People from Gironde
title: Claude Guichard
